name: Oleksii Kachan
title: Full Stack Software Engineer & UI/UX Developer
bio_legacy: Hello there! I am a professional software engineer. My passion is helping business to focus only on business - enterprise automation on higher levels, e.g. MES & ERP System design & development. Also helping business to improve business indicators by getting more customers & sales by implementing marketing projects, e.g. Landing pages.

bio.introduction: Hello there! I am a professional software engineer.
passions: Helping business to focus only on business - enterprise automation on higher levels, e.g. MES & ERP System design & development
Helping business to improve business indicators by getting more customers & sales by implementing marketing projects, e.g. Landing pages
bio.stackIntroduction: I am an Enterprise Software Developer. Mainly I use 2 stacks of technologies:
techStacks: .NET Stack (C#, ASP.NET, WPF, Win. Forms, WCF, MS SQL Server etc.)

projects.title: AGW MES / WMS for automotive industry
projects.projectDescription: AGW MES is an ISA95 compliant web-based product that provides a broad and flexible platform to optimize manufacturing operations. From simple to complex operations, AGW MES manages the entire build process from start to finish providing operators detailed step-by-step directions and controlling their completion. Visualization capabilities give you real-time visibility and historical analytics over all manufacturing operations, enabling you to improve throughput, quality, agility and compliance. AGW MES is a powerful, flexible and scalable Manufacturing Execution System that is easily expanded with business requirements to maximize performance.

projects.title: TDM (Tools Data Manager) for automotive industry.
projects.projectDescription: Tools Data Manager ("TDM") is an advanced manufacturing data collection and management solution that features comprehensive functionality for torque data capture and management.  TDM is designed to simplify the challenge of connecting, extracting, associating, archiving, analyzing and mobilizing manufacturing data generated by localized shop-floor devices; such as, torque assembly systems, process PLCs, testing systems such as Labview, quality systems and etc. From quality & test data to critical process data, TDM aggregates all disparate localized manufacturing data into a single, central database and operating tool offering total control and collaboration.

projects.title: Hyperloop
projects.projectDescription: Hyperloop is a conceptual, high-speed transportation system initially proposed by Elon Musk. The concept consists of passenger and cargo pods being propelled at up to 760 mph in a low pressure tube using sustainable and cost-efficient energy. To accelerate its development, SpaceX is hosted a competition for engineering teams to design their own hyperloop pods and test them at their facility in Hawthorne, California.

projects.title: Corrugated Cardboard Production System
projects.projectDescription: Reverse engineering of ladder-logic based corrugated industrial cardboard production software to get complete networking system. System was developed using ladder logic so I had to understand what is going on there and then create a bunch of technical documentation of how this system works.

projects.title: FTP File Transfer Service
projects.projectDescription: Multi-threaded windows service that transfers files locally and/or remotely via FTP protocol and is configured with *.ini file. All the service events, faults, warnings are logged into local txt file and windows system log.

projects.title: Logo & Card Design
projects.projectDescription: My very first branding project was creating brand of myself. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card. Business card does not have title of person, because I do not want to put myself into frames of who I can be.

projects.title: Logo & Card Design
projects.projectDescription: I created brand for my mother as for financial services provider. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card.

projects.title: Logo & Card Design
projects.projectDescription: I created brand for financial consultant from Ukraine. I defined 2 main colors, created logo, designed 2-side business card and created graphic candle-chart as visual element for business card. Candle-chart displays that person is connected with advanced financial operations.
